comments: Ah, I miss her so much! Shirley is one of the best things in this program. You guys have no idea how much you are going to miss her. TRUST ME!
come to clinical late. she can always be found in the cafeteria. do not give you an answer, always tell you to look up in the book.

Easiest class EVER! She does get discouraged when the class does not participate in the lectures, and the questions she asks of the class are always common sensical. Super nice! All she wants is for you to do the readings prior to class so you can participate in the lectures. If you don\'t participate, she won\'t offer you any help on the test.

she is nice, helpful does not take time to explane that well, you have to do most of the study your self. ask?, she will be direct with you that is what i liked about her. she really cares for her students. you have to do assignment exactaly what she asks.you should pass math 20 in my opnion it will help if your not good at math.

I just started the nursing program. Mrs. Ashburn is on of the lead instructors. She is very nice and helpful. She follows the rules by the book. You must do what you are supposed to do, or she will notice - the teachers all talk, so don\'t get on any bad sides!
